Package planning

Class Technique

  • java.lang.Object
    • planning.Technique
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    JointProductionTechnique
    public class Technique
extends java.lang.Object
    A class to represent a set of production technologies in a more compact form than as an input output table or matrix. It can take advantage of the sparse character of large io tables.

    Copyright (C) 2018 William Paul Cockshott

    • Constructor Detail

      • Technique

        public Technique​(java.lang.String id,
                 int PC,
                 double gO,
                 double[] usage,
                 int[] codes)
        PC is the product code produced

        gO is the gross output working at standard capacity

        usage is the amount of each input used at standard capacity

        codes are the product codes of the inputs being used, stands in one to one correspondence to the usage entries
